description:
Forensic Psychiatry and Psychology are gaining importance in Medicolegal cases where evidence by psychiatry and psychology experts contribute to important legal judgements with a direct bearing on sentences that are imposed on accused
persons. This is complicated by the imprecise nature of Psychiatry and Psychology, compared to other branches of Science. This module aims to educate on the skill sets and limitations of Forensic Psychiatric and Psychological practice
and how they contribute to legal jurisprudence.
title: Forensic Psychiatry and Psychology
